verses.verse: <S%H7181>Listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H7773>cry,<s%> my <S%H4428>King<s%> and my <S%H430>God;<s%> for to you do I <S%H6419>pray.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> I will <S%H6186>lay<s%> my requests before <S%H6822>you,<s%> and will watch expectantly.
For you are not a <S%H410>God<s%> who has <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%> <S%H7451>Evil<s%> <S%H1481>can't<s%> live with you.
The <S%H1984>arrogant<s%> shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%> You <S%H8130>hate<s%> all <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>
You will <S%H6>destroy<s%> those who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8581>abhors<s%> the <S%H1818>bloodthirsty<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

But as for <S%H7230>me,<s%> in the abundance of your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>house.<s%> I will <S%H7812>bow<s%> toward your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%> in reverence of <S%H3374>you.<s%>
<S%H5148>Lead<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, in your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> because of my <S%H8324>enemies.<s%> Make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> before my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

For there is no <S%H3559>faithfulness<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> Their <S%H7130>heart<s%> is <S%H1942>destruction.<s%> Their <S%H1627>throat<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>tomb.<s%> They <S%H2505>flatter<s%> with their <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

Hold them <S%H816>guilty,<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> Let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> by their own <S%H4156>counsels;<s%> Thrust them <S%H5080>out<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions,<s%> for they have rebelled against <S%H4784>you.<s%>

But let all those who take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in you <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> Let them <S%H5769>always<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> because you <S%H5526>defend<s%> <S%H157>them.<s%> Let them also who love your <S%H8034>name<s%> be joyful in <S%H5970>you.<s%>
For you will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you will <S%H5849>surround<s%> him with <S%H7522>favor<s%> as with a <S%H6793>shield.<s%>
